mapper.sql: id, db_name, db_ip, db_port, description, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into databases (id, db_name, db_ip, db_port, description, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

db_ip,
db_port,
description,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update databases
db_name = #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_ip = #{dbIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_port = #{dbPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
